column4: hi, can someone tell me how i can copy and paste some files into my etc folder for ubuntu 9.04 please ? keeps saying i dont have permission :/ but i need to paste some firefox settings and a few other things across from a backup i made
are you sure you don't want to use your ~/.mozilla/ ?
had you made changes to it?
so no point in replacing it
so i was told to back up the wrong folder ?
seems so.  Did you back up your ~ (/home/your_username) ?
great, then your bookmarks are in there.  Just copy over your old ~/.mozilla
my home folder io backed up doesnt have anything to with firefox inside...
view -> show hidden file  should show you a ".mozilla" directory
close firefox, delete/rename new .mozilla and replace it with your old one, restart firefox
